main.name: Stillmen Vallian
main.description: I'm a fresh graduate from Parahyangan Catholic University (UNPAR) majoring in Informatics Engineering. Love to work with new technologies
main.bions: Hi, I'm fresh graduate from Parahyangan Catholic University majoring in Informatics Engineering. I have expertise for use programming language like Java, PHP and HTML. Recently, I'm learning React.js (front-end framework) for self improvement.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Many technologies that can be used for developing applications. Here are the technologies that i love to discovering/playing around with.

education.description: I took my Bachelor's of Information Technology at Parahyangan Catholic University and achieved a much more thorough education in the underlying theory, concepts, and science behind more complex programming. It was here that I discovered many new technologies to create application programming (web and mobile).

work.title: Photographer
work.description: Working under an event organizer named SOZO with a photographer job. Documenting the event for 3 days in the form of photos and videos

techs.name: Java
techs.description: Java was my first programming language that I started using in college 4 years ago. It is by far the language I am most familiar with in terms of data-structure and algorithm programming

techs.name: Git
techs.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control for developing some software. GitHub is one that I often use

techs.name: React.js
techs.description: I am really new to React and really enjoy to discovering this framework. It has grown on me though and I will continue to use it for developing some front-end website.

techs.name: CodeIgniter
techs.description: CodeIgniter (CI) was my first framework to developing full stack website. CodeIgniter has many features can facilitate users in developing a website. I also use this framework to build website for thesis purpose (below in portfolio)

projects.title: Unpar Apps Landing Page
projects.category: Landing page for Unpar Apps promotion

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
